EmailTemplate.name: Final Fast-track (may)
EmailTemplate.subject: Final chance to apply for a Leader role on the NCS programme
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Please do not respond to this email. The email was sent from an unattended mailbox and responses are not reviewed. Please instead contact us on seasonalroles@the-challenge.org.
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
The NCS Summer programme kicks off in less than a month, and most of our roles are now full. With limited vacancies remaining, we wanted to let you know that this is your last chance to apply for the few roles that we have left.
Get your application in by 31st May 2016 and we’ll fast-track your application!
What roles are still available?
The following roles are now full, and you will no longer be able to select them in the application form.
Support Worker Personal Coach Learning and Behaviour Mentor Residential Mentor Programme Administrator
We have also nearly filled all of our Senior Mentor and Practitioner roles, so we’re unlikely to be able to offer you these roles in the Summer programme.
However, we are still recruiting for Programme Leader, Assistant Programme Leader and Senior Community Facilitator roles in most locations nationally - these roles are perfect for candidates with the confidence, enthusiasm and energy needed to lead a group of 60 young people through an intense programme. These roles vary in length from 4 days to 3 weeks.
As it is late in our recruitment stage we can not guarantee you will be
If you feel that you would make a great leader on the NCS summer programme, this is your last chance to get your application in!
Click here to continue your application!
What else?
Our application form is available in different formats! If you have any additional needs and would like us to make our application process more accessible to you, please contact our Inclusion Staffing team on inclusion.ss@the-challenge.org as soon as possible.
If you have any other questions about the application process, please get in touch with us on seasonalroles@the-challenge.org. We look forward to receiving your application!
Best wishes,
The Staffing Team The Challenge seasonalroles@the-challenge.org
